dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1966
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Attends a conference on inter-religious dialogue and goes on a speaking trip through the Midwest. Visits friends and describes their work. Mentions progress in the farm workers strike. Keywords: Vietnam
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 837 1966-04-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
